confirm.description:
The Ecobee `set_aux_heat` action has been migrated. A new `aux_heat_only` switch entity is available for each thermostat that supports a Heat Pump.

Update any automations to use the new `aux_heat_only` switch entity. When this is done, fix this issue and restart Home Assistant.
confirm.title: Disable legacy Ecobee set_aux_heat action

confirm.description:
The Ecobee `notify` service has been migrated. A new `notify` entity per Thermostat is available now.

Update any automations to use the new `notify.send_message` exposed by these new entities. When this is done, fix this issue and restart Home Assistant.
confirm.title: Disable legacy Ecobee notify service

create_vacation.description: Creates a vacation on the selected thermostat. Note: start/end date and time must all be specified together for these parameters to have an effect. If start/end date and time are not specified, the vacation will start immediately and last 14 days (unless deleted earlier).

end_date.description: Date the vacation ends in the YYYY-MM-DD format (optional, 14 days from now if not provided along with end_time).
end_date.name: End date

end_time.description: Time the vacation ends, in the local time of the thermostat, in the 24-hour format "HH:MM:SS".
end_time.name: End time

entity_id.description: Ecobee thermostat on which to create the vacation.
entity_id.name: Entity

fan_min_on_time.description: Minimum number of minutes to run the fan each hour (0 to 60) during the vacation.
fan_min_on_time.name: Fan minimum on time

fan_mode.description: Fan mode of the thermostat during the vacation.
fan_mode.name: Fan mode

start_date.description: Date the vacation starts in the YYYY-MM-DD format (optional, immediately if not provided along with start_time).
start_date.name: Start date

start_time.description: Time the vacation starts, in the local time of the thermostat, in the 24-hour format "HH:MM:SS".
start_time.name: Start time

vacation_name.description: Name of the vacation to create; must be unique on the thermostat.
vacation_name.name: Vacation name

create_vacation.name: Create vacation

delete_vacation.description: Deletes a vacation on the selected thermostat.

entity_id.description: Ecobee thermostat on which to delete the vacation.
entity_id.name: Entity

vacation_name.description: Name of the vacation to delete.
vacation_name.name: Vacation name

delete_vacation.name: Delete vacation
